ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and We caused a gourd tree to grow over him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And We made a gourd tree grow over him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and caused a gourd tree to grow over him,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We made a plant of gourd grow up for him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And We grew a tree of gourd (as a shelter) above him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And We caused a plant of gourd to grow over him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And We caused to grow up for him a gourdplant.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and We caused to grow over him a tree of gourds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And We caused a tree of gourd to grow above him;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and We caused a gourd tree to grow over him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And We caused to grow over him a tree, a gourd.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So We made a gourd plant grow above him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And We caused to grow, over him, a spreading plant of the gourd kind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And We caused a plant of gourd to grow over him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and We caused a pumpkin tree to grow over him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And We made a gourd tree grow over him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We caused to grow over him a gourd vine.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:146] And We made a gourd plant to grow above him, to provide shade for him with its stem, which is not the case usually with gourds, as a miracle for him; a mountain goat would come to him in the morning and in the evening and he would drink its milk, until he finally regained his strength.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And We caused a tree of gourd to grow above him;
